name: Leo Star Shards
description: An ancient painting passed down for generation in House Laplace, Trillion Stars in a Descending Night Sky depicts the star phantom that is materialized by a goddess to bless people with. (Collect and give it to a goddess and you'll probably receive something nice. )

name: Libra Crown
description: Crown that symbolizes Libra, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with cat's eye.

name: Libra Crown Blueprint
description: Crown that symbolizes Libra, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with cat's eye.

name: Libra Crown [1]
description: Crown that symbolizes Libra, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with cat's eye.

name: Libra Diadem
description: Diadem that symbolizes Libra, the seventh of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with cat's eye.

name: Libra Diadem [1]
description: Diadem that symbolizes Libra, the seventh of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with cat's eye.

name: Libra Diadem [1] Blueprint
description: Diadem that symbolizes Libra, the seventh of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with cat's eye.

name: Libra Star Aroma
description: The product of the year by Vettel Moura, the 14th president of House Moura, the most famous perfume family of the land, the constellation series is only available during respective month. Muse Moura is a star in his school because he uses different perfume every month. (Use to protect yourself with a constellation symbol that is graceful and stylish. )

name: Lich Staff [1]
description: A Rod that can transform the mental force of the user into destructive force when used.

name: Lich Staff [2]
description: A Rod that can transform the mental force of the user into destructive force when used.

name: Lich's Bone Wand [2]
description: A staff made of bones. The spell sealed inside will curse all enemies.

name: Lich's Bone Wand [3]
description: A staff made of bones. The spell sealed inside will curse all enemies.

name: Life in Spring
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [How much evil is hidden behind the seemingly prosperous and peaceful urban civilization?]

name: Life Magic Book
description: A thick magic book, said to be the lifetime diary of Magical Master Maggie Marte.
effect: SP cost of all skills -12%,[Life Magic Book IV] ＋[Bunny Slipper]: Cooldown of all skills shortens by 5%

name: Life Magic Book [1]
description: A thick magic book, said to be the lifetime diary of Magical Master Maggie Marte.
effect: SP cost of all skills -12%,[Life Magic Book IV] ＋[Bunny Slipper]: Cooldown of all skills shortens by 5%

name: Light Epsilon [1]
description: An axe with divine power. It is often used at ceremonies.

name: Light Epsilon [2]
description: An axe with divine power. It is often used at ceremonies.

name: Light Granule
description: Golden Crystal. It seems to be full of sunlight and looks warm. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.
